segments.text: I see two children trying to get cookies from a jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, trying to grab some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is unstable and could cause an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy seems determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know their mom is right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks excited, hoping to get a cookie soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they should be more careful with that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried for them, hoping they don't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is a bit tense, but also kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR
